name: 透
text:
駐車場みたいなとこ
裏にある、店とかの
trans:
The place that looks like a carpark.
Behind shops and stuff.

name: 透
text:
んー、そういうとこ
夜で、めっちゃ
trans:
Hmm, yeah that.
Happens a lot, at night.

name: 透
text:
いなくて、まわり
歩いてる人とか
trans:
You don't see anyone.
Walking around and stuff.

name: 透
text:
殴り合ってる
めっちゃ
trans:
They were beating one another.
Very much.

name: 透
text:
……え？　会社員みたいな人とか
よくわかんない人とか
trans:
...Eh? Some office worker-looking person
and some other random person.

name: 透
text:
んー
ふふっ、１対１でやる。集まってきて
trans:
Mm.
Fufu, they assembled and fought. One on one.

name: 透の担任
text:
いいとこ来た
カメラ、持ってってくれるかー
trans:
Good timing.
Could you take this camera off me?

name: 透の担任
text:
おー、球技大会な。係だったろー
先生、明日は朝から会議が続くから
trans:
Right, for the ball games competition. You're in 
charge of the photos, remember? Teacher's got a 
meeting all morning tomorrow, you see.

name: 雛菜
text: 透先輩、カメラ係やるの～？

name: 雛菜
trans: Then, Hinana wants to do that too～！

name: 透の担任
text:
……市川さんだっけ。自分のクラスで頑張ることー
種目、何か出るでしょう
trans:
...Ichikawa-san, right? You should focus on helping 
your class in the games.
You have a sport assigned to you, right?

name: 雛菜
text:
へ～？
雛菜ってなんか出るんだっけ～？
trans:
Heh～?
What was Hinana's sport again～?

name: 雛菜
text:
あは～
そしたら雛菜、バスケに出る～
trans:
Aha～
Then, Hinana will do basketball～

name: 透の担任
text:
……それじゃまぁ、取りにきて
カメラ扱えるようになっといてくれなー
trans:
...Well then, here.
Familiarise yourself with it before the event, 
alright?

name: 透
text:
殴り合う
夜になると
trans:
The fighting begins
when night falls.

name: 透
text:
どこかから集まってきた
人たちが
trans:
People from all places gathered
at that one spot.

name: 透
text:
歌うみたいに
泣くみたいに
trans:
It was as if they were singing.
Crying.

name: 透
text: 夢から覚めるみたいに
trans: Like waking up from a fever dream.

name: 透
text:
んー
観てよ、雛菜も

name: 雛菜
text: その人たちどこにいるの～？

name: 雛菜
text:
あ～
テレビのことか～
trans:
Ah～
You're talking about a movie, huh～

name: 雛菜
text: 透先輩、ちゃんとこっち見てる～？
trans: Toru-senpai, are you looking here properly～?

name: 透
text:
ガツン、ドン
もっと

name: 透
text:
レンズの向こう
雛菜が

name: 透
text:
ズダン、バキッ
ドン

name: 透
text:
いけるなら
もっと

name: 透
text:
カシャッ
バキバキ

name: 透
text:
こういう感じかもしれない
たぶん
trans:
Maybe this is how it feels like.
Probably.

name: 透
text:
殴ったり
殴られたり

name: 透
trans:
Let me take more of it.
Hit me.
